definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Remove bolts holding shift lever to transmission.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸將排擋杆固定到變速箱的螺栓。

sentences.english: It uses a 7-speed sequential-manual gearbox with paddle shifters on the steering wheel .
sentences.chinese: 它採用了7速順序手動變速箱的換檔方向盤上。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the development course of the tech no logy of precision forging on synchronizer ring in car gearbox.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了汽車變速箱同步環精鍛技術的發展歷程。

sentences.english: Transmissions - most teams run seven-speed units - bolt directly to the back of the engine.
sentences.chinese: 大多數車隊的變速箱有七個檔位，直接與引擎相連接。

sentences.english: Not suitable for use in synchro mesh gearboxes due to the extreme slipperiness.
sentences.chinese: 在不適合使用同步器變速箱，由於極端滑溜。

sentences.english: The author has put forward a mathematical model of kinematics for tractor gearbox.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了變速箱運動學的數學模型。

sentences.english: The main machining surface of the car gearbox parts is the plane and a series of hole.
sentences.chinese: 汽車變速箱箱體零件的主要加工表面是平面及孔系。

sentences.english: "We had a gearbox problem, the car was not doing well when I was running, " Barrichello explained to BBC Sport.
sentences.chinese: 我們的變速箱有點問題，我跑的時候賽車表現不太好。

sentences.english: Perhaps we will even see a seven-speed second-generation DSG in the new car.
sentences.chinese: 也許我們甚至將看到一個七速二代的DSG變速箱。

sentences.english: Going into the gearbox, universal joints connect the centre drive shaft to the internal bevel gears.
sentences.chinese: 進入變速箱，萬向節連接中心傳動軸到內部錐齒輪。

sentences.english: After improved, the pinhole rib of gearbox has no longer produced crack.
sentences.chinese: 改進後變速箱體銷孔凸緣曲線不再產生裂紋現象。

sentences.english: Check the manual transaxle fluid level.
Power is sent to all four wheels through a six-speed automatic transmission.
sentences.chinese: 電力是發送到所有四個車輪通過一個六速自動變速箱。

sentences.english: Where world medium-size bus passenger car 145 speed change boxes Yinchuan has sell?
sentences.chinese: 宇通中巴客車145變速箱銀川哪裏有賣的？

sentences.english: The dual-clutch gearbox contains two wet clutches with two drive shafts.
sentences.chinese: 雙離合器變速箱包含帶兩根驅動軸的兩個溼式離合器。

sentences.english: On a four-speed box the bearings are under load 25% of the time.
sentences.chinese: 四檔變速箱的軸承有25%的時間受載。

definition: valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
